title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the qualified small issue bond provisions.
content: Bond Financing Renewal Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code regarding qualified small issue bonds to: (1) increase the cap and capital expenditure amounts from $10 million to $20 million, with an inflation adjustment beginning in 2004. And (2) expand the definition of manufacturing facility to include certain biotech and software production.
